Well actually I used the words fell backwards, but I
meant the same thing. Now can you tell me about those
blasts that I DID post AFTER responding to BOTH your
attacks. Furthermore I specifically remember Hugar
posting Rampage attacking. And since Mutate was
emmiting energon you should at least accept that one
of your swords broke.

--- Legendarynemasis@... wrote:
> you never said the blasts threw him backwards. And I
> do recall mutate wasnt 
> the most sturdy of transformers...
